text: The Finnish Mixed Doubles Curling Championship is the national championship of mixed doubles curling in Finland. It has been held annually since 2008.Finnish Mixed Doubles Championships - Finnish championships - past seasons | Curling.fi ==List of champions and medallists== {| class="wikitable" border="1" |- ! Year ! Champion ! Runner-up ! Bronze !
